title: Men's 1500 m - Speed Skating Innsbruck 1976 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 1500 m 1976","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":"4.","9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"7.","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"12.","17":"13.","18":"14.","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"18.","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"25.","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":"29.","34":"30.","35":null,"36":null,"37":"Men's 1500 m - Speed Skating - Innsbruck 1976 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Men's 1500 m competition was held at the Olympiaeisschnelllaufbahn and 30 athletes participated in the event.","38":null,"39":"These results for Men's 1500 m - Innsbruck 1976 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","40":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 1500 m 1976","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Jan Egil Storholt","6":"Yuri Kondakov","7":"Hans van Helden","8":"Sergei Riabev","9":"Daniel Carroll","10":"Piet Kleine","11":"Eric Heiden","12":"Colin Coates","13":"Klaus Wunderlich","14":"Olavi K\u00f6pp\u00e4","15":"Kai Arne Stenshjemmet","16":"Herbert Schwarz","17":"Sergey Marchuk","18":"Gaetan Boucher","19":"Terje Andersen","20":"Dan Johansson","21":"Lennart Carlsson","22":"Lee Young-ha","23":"Bruno Toniolli","24":"Richard Tourne","25":"Masahiko Yamamoto","26":"Mats Wallberg","27":"Michael Woods","28":"Geoffrey Sandys","29":"Floriano Martello","30":"Ludwig Kronfuss","31":"Franz Krienb\u00fchl","32":"Gilbert van Eesbeeck","33":"Berend Schabus","34":"Giovanni Panciera","35":null,"36":null,"37":"Men's 1500 m - Speed Skating - Innsbruck 1976 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
